# we-slider

```html
<we-slider value=10 min=0 max=50>Slider 1</we-slider>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property            | Attribute         | Description                                                                                  | Type      | Default     |
| ------------------- | ----------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `changeCallback`    | `change-callback` | Event triggered any time user moves the slider putting in the payload name and current value | `any`     | `undefined` |
| `disabled`          | `disabled`        | Identify if slider is disabled or not                                                        | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `max`               | `max`             | Maximum value you can set in the slider                                                      | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `min`               | `min`             | Minimum value you can set in the slider                                                      | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `name` _(required)_ | `name`            | Name of slider, put in the payload of changeCallback event                                   | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `value`             | `value`           | Starting value of slider                                                                     | `number`  | `undefined` |


----------------------------------------------
